english.segment1: Oh heart of mine, why must you stray?. From one so fair you run away. And one more time you have to pay. The heaviness of needless shame
english.segment2: Oh heart of mine, come back home. You've been too long out on your own. And He's been there all along. Watching for you down the road
english.segment3: So come home running. His arms are open wide. His name is Jesus. He understands. He is the answer. You are looking for. So come home running. Just as you are
english.segment4: Oh child of God so dearly loved. And ransomed by the Savior's blood. And called by name, Daughter and Son. Wrapped in the robe of righteousness
